attributes.action: Award Captain Tom with a Knighthood
attributes.additional_details: Captain Tom has shown true British spirit and managed to raise an incredible £13m for our NHS. He's an inspiration to us all and deserves the highest level of recognition for this achievement.
attributes.background: The 99-year-old war veteran has walked 100 laps around his garden to raise more than £13m for the NHS. This is a remarkable achievement and should be recognised with a Knighthood.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
